channel.title: How To Make Your Own RuneScape Private Server (Full Version)
channel.description:
[b]How To Make Your Own RuneScape Private Server[/b] [b]By:GamersTips[/b] [b](Scott)[/b] (Reply in this thread if this helped, or if it didnt)
[b]Chapter.1 Getting Your Server[/b]
[b]Chapter.2 Getting a A Server IP[/b]
[b]Chapter.3 Editing Your Server[/b]
[b]Getting Your Server[/b] Ok, to start your server, you must download MoparScape, you can get it here http://rs95.rapidshare.com/files/28641428/MoparScapeInstall.exe
[b]Getting a A Server IP[/b] Ok, once you have downloaded moparscape, you need to register at No-ip.com Heres the link http://www.no-ip.com/
Once you have registered, log in, then click on add host [img]http://img34.picoodle.com/img/img34/4/7/12/f_ruescapem_6ee531c.png[/img]

                                                        [b]How To Make Your Own RuneScape Private Server[/b]
                                                                              [b]By:GamersTips[/b]
                                                                                    [b](Scott)[/b]
                                                                (Reply in this thread if this helped, or if it didnt)

Chapter.1 Getting Your Server

Chapter.2 Getting a A Server IP

                               [b]Getting Your Server[/b]

Ok, to start your server, you must download MoparScape, you can get it here
http://rs95.rapidshare.com/files/28641428/MoparScapeInstall.exe

                               [b]Getting a A Server IP[/b]

Ok, once you have downloaded moparscape, you need to register at No-ip.com Heres the link
http://www.no-ip.com/

Once you have registered, log in, then click on add host
